title: march 21: hello world send tweet
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the founding of Twitter. After, she remembers the film Selena, starring Jennifer Lopez. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
